title: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
description: When retrieving datetime values from a table, there is a discrepancy in the format displayed between the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
OB: Datetime values retrieved from the table are displayed in different formats, depending on whether they are shown in a dynamic text item or a data/text item.
EB: The datetime values retrieved from the table should be displayed using the same format in both the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Insert a text, data, or dynamic text item that displays datetime values. 
2. Retrieve datetime values from a table and set them as the data source for the items. 
3. Observe the displayed datetime format in both the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
